duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop proposed code changes and submit to agency for review and approval.
Maintain industry knowledge and propose membership of new committees.
Identify codes and standards requirements with appropriate team; plan project and resource requirements and manage projects through completion.
Research and monitor national/international code activities within the industry and ensure Viega products meet new or existing codes and standards requirements.
Support customers/stakeholders in developing business cases and market research projects.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in mechanical engineering or related discipline strongly preferred (Master’s preferred)
